text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function)

Product keywords:
Wrench: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8
1-phillips, 1-flat screwdriver
3.5 inches long / 89mm 
chain tool 
disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench
four spoke wrench sizes; 8mm and 10mm open wrench 
Specs: Weight: 168 grams; Length - 3.5 inches; Frame - 6061-T6 aluminum; Tools - 6051 high tensile steel.
text.Response A: The Crank Brothers Multi 17 is the ultimate multi-tool for on-the-go bike repairs. With a lightweight aluminum body and high tensile steel tools, this multi-tool is as durable as they come. It features all the tools you'll need to make adjustments to your bike on the fly, including: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 8mm wrenches; 1 phillips and 1 flat screwdriver; a chain tool; disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench; and four spoke wrench sizes. At only 89mm long, this is the perfect multi-tool to keep in your pocket at all times.
text.Response B: The CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function) is a must-have for any cyclist. With 17 different tools, it has everything you need to fix your bike while on the go. The wrench sizes include 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, and 8mm. There's also a 1-Phillips and 1-flat screwdriver, as well as a chain tool and a disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench. With a weight of only 168 grams and a length of 3.5 inches, this tool is small enough to fit in your pocket or bag. Made of durable 6061-T6 aluminum and 6051 high tensile steel, it's sure to last you a long time.

meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

738.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function)

Product keywords:
Wrench: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8
1-phillips, 1-flat screwdriver
3.5 inches long / 89mm
chain tool
disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench
four spoke wrench sizes; 8mm and 10mm open wrench
Specs: Weight: 168 grams; Length - 3.5 inches; Frame - 6061-T6 aluminum; Tools - 6051 high tensile steel.

Response A

The Crank Brothers Multi 17 is the ultimate multi-tool for on-the-go bike repairs. With a lightweight aluminum body and high tensile steel tools, this multi-tool is as durable as they come. It features all the tools you'll need to make adjustments to your bike on the fly, including: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 8mm wrenches; 1 phillips and 1 flat screwdriver; a chain tool; disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench; and four spoke wrench sizes. At only 89mm long, this is the perfect multi-tool to keep in your pocket at all times.

Response B

The CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function) is a must-have for any cyclist. With 17 different tools, it has everything you need to fix your bike while on the go. The wrench sizes include 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, and 8mm. There's also a 1-Phillips and 1-flat screwdriver, as well as a chain tool and a disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench. With a weight of only 168 grams and a length of 3.5 inches, this tool is small enough to fit in your pocket or bag. Made of durable 6061-T6 aluminum and 6051 high tensile steel, it's sure to last you a long time.
